@notice Return the metadata URI for a piece of media given the token URI
@notice Mint new media for msg.sender.

auctionTransfer(uint256,address).details: This can only be called by the auction contract specified at deployment

auctionTransfer(uint256,address).notice: Transfer the token with the given ID to a given address. Save the previous owner before the transfer, in case there is a sell-on fee.

mintWithSig(address,(string,string,bytes.notice: EIP-712 mintWithSig method. Mints new media for a creator given a valid signature.

permit(address,uint256,(uint256,uint8,by.notice: EIP-712 permit method. Sets an approved spender given a valid signature.

removeAsk(uint256).notice: Remove the ask on a piece of media

removeBid(uint256).notice: Remove the bid on a piece of media

revokeApproval(uint256).notice: Revoke approval for a piece of media

setAsk(uint256,(uint256,address)).notice: Set the ask on a piece of media

setBid(uint256,(uint256,address,address,.notice: Set the bid on a piece of media

tokenMetadataURI(uint256).notice: Return the metadata URI for a piece of media given the token URI
